TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {5663=I'd forgotten about the effect of polarized glasses even though it was a problem with my G9, http://lightdescription.blogspot.com/2008/03/g9-on-parade.html . Confirmed today that the G1X display is very readable in "landscape" orientation but disappears in "portrait" orientation when wearing polarized sunglasses.}
textBeforeTable: Flat view Next unread Next Previous First Parent Forum Complain Reply   Reply with quote   Gordon http://lightdescription.blogspot.com (Probably a good subject for a post in my blog.) I'd forgotten about the effect of polarized glasses even though it was a problem with my G9, http://lightdescription.blogspot.com/2008/03/g9-on-parade.html . Confirmed today that the G1X display is very readable in "landscape" orientation but disappears in "portrait" orientation when wearing polarized sunglasses. -- hide signature --
